name: v1.0.6
body:
# ADX MCP Server v1.0.6

This release adds DevContainer Feature support to the ADX MCP Server, making it easier to develop and use the server in containerized environments.

## New Features

* Added DevContainer Feature for seamless development experience (PR #34, @caol-ila)
* Added GitHub workflow for releasing DevContainer Features
* Updated Dockerfile to include Azure CLI for easier authentication
* Enhanced documentation for DevContainer usage
* Fixed path references in DevContainer documentation

## Installation

### Using pip
```bash
pip install adx-mcp-server==1.0.6
```

### Using Docker
```bash
docker pull pab1it0/adx-mcp-server:1.0.6
```

### Using DevContainer Feature
Add the following to your `devcontainer.json`:
```json
"features": {
    "ghcr.io/pab1it0/devcontainer-features/adx-mcp-server:1.0.0": {
        "version": "latest",
        "adxClusterUrl": "https://cluster.region.kusto.windows.net",
        "adxDatabase": "my_database"
    }
}
```

## Documentation

See the updated [README.md](https://github.com/pab1it0/adx-mcp-server/blob/main/README.md) and [DevContainer Feature documentation](https://github.com/pab1it0/adx-mcp-server/blob/main/devcontainer-feature/adx-mcp-server/README.md) for more details.
